Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Increases the notice of cancellation requirements for automobile broker businesses
Summary: Increases the notice of cancellation requirements for automobile broker businesses.
LawCode: Amd §§738 & 741-a, Gen Bus L (as proposed in S.7553-A & A.3499-B)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to increasing the notice of cancellation requirements for automobile broker businesses
